maps¶

maps.py

author: Yasutaka Hanada (2013/05/17)

系はkicked rotator

\[H(q,p) = T(p) + V(q)\sum_{n\in\mathbb{Z}}\delta(t-n)\]

で定義します．

StandardMap¶

class SimpleQmap.maps.StandardMap(k)¶

ベースクラス: SimpleQmap.maps.Symplectic

標準写像

Hamiltonian

\[T(p) = \frac{p^2}{2},\qquad \frac{k}{4\pi^2}\cos(2\pi q) \]

Phase space portrait of Standard Map with \(k = 1\)

Parameters:

k : float

paramter

Methods

func0(x)¶

return \(dV(q)/dq = k\sin(2\pi q)/2\pi\)

x: array like
Returns:out: array like
func1(x)¶

return \(dT(p)/dp = p\)

x: array like
Returns:out: array like
ifunc0(x)¶

return \(V(q)\)

x: array like
Returns:out: array like
ifunc1(x)¶

return \(T(p)\)

x: array like
Returns:out: array like
